Title: Getting Started with MCP (Model Context Protocol)
Author: Nick Chapsas
Description:
Get 30% off everything on Dometrain: https://dometrain.com/courses/?ref=nick-chapsas&promo=youtube&coupon\_code=SUMMER30 Subscribe to my weekly newsletter: https://nickchapsas.com

Hello, everybody. I'm Nick, and in this video, Dan Clarke will introduce you to the brand new concept of Model Context Protocol or MCPs. With the meteoric rise of AI and LLMs, MCPs aim to fulfil the promise of having a consistent way of interfacing with data through different LLMs.
